EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome Back to VinSolutions!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome Back to VinSolutions!
An email will be sent to you with a link to setup your login credentials. If you do not see the email in your inbox, please check the Junk folder. If they do not get this email, please email salesforce@vinsolutions.com and request to regenerate password. Regenerating a new password will send you another email to setup your login.
Don't Forget to: Update your email settings in Salesforce and Outlook, click here for instructions.
Thank you,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.Phone}, Ext.{!User.Extension}3
